about_the_game:
Assume the role of one of universe’s most powerful Heroines as you settle their disputes with each other through excessive firepower! In this puzzle action game, use your actions to form patterns, clear your board of bullets, and bombard the opponent! Deal with the curtain of bullets coming at you each round and be the last heroine standing to win!

Discover charismatic heroines


Each Heroine wields a different power that changes how you experience the game! A plethora of wildly asymmetric characters await, each with their own way of interacting with bullets and wrecking stuff! Find the one that suits you best or try to master them all.

Plenty of game modes


Learn the ins and outs of your character and get to the top of the leaderboards in Score Attack, or fight each heroine's dangerous Boss mode, where that character's unique traits are turned against you in a thrilling strategic battle. Classic mode is also available, where you compete using the original board game's rules.



Bullet: Surge is not just an adaptation of the hit board game: it's a whole new experience optimized for the digital medium!

Demo vs full version


The demo will let you experience a lot of the game, but in the full version you will have access to the whole cast of 8 heroines, both in their Classic and Surge version. You will be able to fight against 8 unique bosses, as well as against your friends and the whole world in versus mode.
